meta_description: Discover Minnetrista Museum & Gardens, your year-round gathering space. Explore captivating exhibitions, exciting community events, and inspiring workshops. Plan your visit today!
hours_text:
# plan your visit

With a forty-acre campus and a variety of events throughout the year, there’s always more to do and see at Minnetrista. Whether you’re a first-time visitor or a returning member, explore our many events and attractions based on your interests. There’s truly something for everyone!

### Hours

**Indoor Areas**

[ Exhibitions](/gallery-exhibits) & [The Orchard Shop](/the-orchard-shop):

**Wednesday–Saturday**  
9 a.m. to 5 p.m.

**Sunday  
** Noon–5 p.m.**  
  
Monday & Tuesday**   
Closed

[Heritage Collection Library](/heritage-collection):

**Monday–Friday**   
9 a.m. to 5 p.m. by [appointment](mailto:ssmith@minnetrista.net?subject=Heritage%20Collection%20Appointment%20Request)

**Outdoor Areas**

[ Nature Area & Oakhurst Gardens:](/gardens-nature-area)

**Winter Hours:**__ September 22–March 31

**Monday–Saturday**   
8 a.m. to 6 p.m.

**Sunday**   
Noon to 6 p.m.

**Summer Hours:**__ April 1–September 21

**Monday–Saturday**   
8 a.m. to 8 p.m.  
  
**Sunday**  
Noon–6 p.m.

### Location

**Minnetrista Center Building:  
**[1200 N. Minnetrista Pkwy.](https://maps.app.goo.gl/mU46ZQna85mg5kzD6)[  
Muncie, IN 47303](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1200+N+Minnetrista+Pkwy,+Muncie,+IN+47303/@40.2052304,-85.392142,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x88153d9b6afcb943:0xe1b291e5f74e07be!8m2!3d40.2052304!4d-85.3899533)

### Contact Information

Phone: [765.282.4848](tel:+17652824848)

Email: [info@minnetrista.net](mailto:info@minnetrista.net)

admission_text:
# membership

### Minnetrista Memberships

Minnetrista is a one-of-a kind destination for discovery that is perfect for connecting with family and friends. With our engaging exhibitions, fun events and programming, and beautiful gardens and grounds, Minnetrista has something for everyone.

We invite you to become a part of the Minnetrista family today, and gain exclusive benefits and unparalleled access to our campus.

_Memberships provide admission for two named adults and all children in their household under the age of 18 for one year._

#### **_Ready to join or renew?_**

[ become a member today! ](https://mmg.ticketapp.org/portal/pages/memberships)

## Membership Levels

#### Local Family Access Membership - $45

 _This membership is available only to residents of our 7-county home service area: Blackford, Delaware, Grant, Henry, Jay, Madison, and Randolph._

  * **Free admission** to exhibitions, _Oakhurst Experience_ , and _Bob Ross Experience_

  * **$1 off** general admission for additional guests 

  * **10% discount** at The Orchard Shop

  * **10% discount** on ticketed programs and events for up to **four people** per household

  * **Digital subscription** to **_Columns_ magazine** published three times annually 

  * Quarterly mailing of the **_Events & Activities Guide_**

  * **Invitations** to exhibition openings and other exclusive events

  * **Free** Explorer Bag check-out

#### Explorer Membership - $100

### There’s something new to experience on every visit!

We maintain a spacious forty-acre campus which is open to the public and includes beautiful gardens, our Nature Area, a modern museum facility, historic homes, children’s play areas, and a portion of the White River Greenway. Throughout the year our roster of educational programs, engaging workshops, community events, and interactive exhibits are consistently rotating and changing.

[ plan your visit ](/plan-your-visit)

[ who we are ](/who-we-are)
